metadata.title: CVE-2016-9954 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The backtrack compilation code in the Irregex package (aka IrRegularExpressions) before 0.9.6 for Scheme allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted regular expressionwith a repeating pattern.

criterions.comment: chicken: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
